messages.subject: Homeschoolers in local MA newspaper
messages.msgSnippet: Yesterday s (Wednesday 18 August) Newton (MA) Tab has a nice article on homeschoolers; it starts on the front page and continues onto two more pages.  Concise
messages.messageBody:
Yesterday's (Wednesday 18 August) Newton (MA) Tab has
a
nice article on homeschoolers; it starts on the front
page and continues onto two more pages. Concise and
respectful, with some debunking of myths. They even
used the word unschooling once, although it was not
defined or elaborated upon. Nice to see it entering
the consciousness a bit.

http://www2.townonline.com/newton/localRegional/view.bg?articleid=68670

Michael

=====
"Did you try not being a mutant?"
"Most people will never know anything beyond what they see with their own two eyes."
--both from "X2: X-Men United"

"Maybe that's all that we need, is to meet in the middle of impossibility..."
--Indigo Girls, "Mystery"

"The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return."
--Eden Ahbez, "Nature Boy"

"To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting."
--e.e. cummings

"The worst loneliness is not to be comfortable with yourself."
- Mark Twain
